actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Resolution requesting the President of the United States to appoint a special prosecutor in connection with the Presidential election of 1972.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the President of the United States be requested to appoint a special prosecutor in any and all criminal actions arising from any illegal activity in the Presidential election of 1972. Provides that the President shall submit the name of such designee to the Senate requesting a resolution of approval thereof.

titles.title: Resolution requesting the President of the United States to appoint a special prosecutor in connection with the Presidential election of 1972.
